ruling: - You can destroy [[Jinzo]], [[Royal Decree]], [[Tyrant Dragon]], [[Sorcerer of Dark Magic]], [[Fiend Skull Dragon]], and [[The Dragon's Bead]] with this card's effect.
- You cannot destroy [[Ryu Senshi]] because of its effect that prevents it from being targeted by a Spell Card.
- You cannot destroy [[Reaper of the Cards]] or [[Trap Master]] because they do not negate Trap Cards, they destroy Trap Cards.

- You can only destroy face-up cards with the effect of [[Double Snare]]. The opponent may chain [[Book of Moon]] to your [[Double Snare]] to flip their monster face-down, and it will not be destroyed.
